title: Class III equipment
fullText:
For equipment other than medical electrical equipmentâ€”Class III equipment as defined in AS/NZS 3100.
NOTES:
1	Class III equipment is supplied from an extra-low-voltage supply.
2	There is no Class III equipment classification for medical electrical equipment in AS/NZS IEC 60601.1. That Standard treats such equipment as 'internally powered equipment' or combines it with any remote extra-low-voltage supply as a single item of equipment. In the latter case, the combination is classified as Class I equipment if the extra-low-voltage supply requires protective earthing, or as Class II equipment if it does not require protective earthing.
